benchmark_details.name: ISCO-800
benchmark_details.overview: The ISCO-800 dataset includes 800 pieces of user background information, representing various occupational groups, to enhance user-oriented proactivity in open-domain dialogues.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a dataset that facilitates the training of chatbots capable of engaging with users from diverse backgrounds.

data.source: Constructed from ISCO-08 classification by the International Labour Organization.
data.annotation: Automatically generated based on prompts given to an LLM.

methodology.calculation: Scores are derived using a critic that evaluates user-oriented proactivity during dialogues.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better engagement and relevance to user backgrounds.
methodology.validation: Iterative curriculum learning to improve engagement based on user feedback.
